import React from 'react' const Pokeinfo = ({ data }) => { console.log("data",data) return ( <> { (!data) ? " " : ( <>

{data.name[0].toUpperCase().concat(data.name.substring(1))}

Height: {Math.floor(data.height* 0.32808)}ft

Weight: {data.weight}lbs

{(data.abilities[0].ability.name === undefined) ? "no abilities" : data.abilities[0].ability.name}

{(data.abilities[1] === undefined) ? "no abilities" : data.abilities[1].ability.name}

{data.stats[0].base_stat} HP

{data.stats[1].base_stat} attack

{data.stats[2].base_stat} defense

{data.stats[3].base_stat} Special Attack

speed

) } ) } export default Pokeinfo
